Each win increases the first number (wins) by 1, and each loss increases the second number (losses) by 1. In the May 30 game, the score is "6-4", which means our team scored 6 runs against the Mariners' 4. So, it's a win for our team.

Looking at the previous day, May 29 (index 28), the record was "27 - 24". After winning on May 30, the next day, May 31 (index 30), the record becomes "28 - 25" because they lost that game. So, yes, on May 30, after their win, the record updated to 28-24.
